Podcast: Election Accuracy Day of Action Recap

SecuretheVoteMD recently hosted the Election Accuracy Day of Action, an event focused on educating citizens and elected representatives about best practices for securing our elections. This podcast segment recaps key discussions from the event, exploring essential policies and legislative efforts to strengthen election security, enhance transparency, and restore trust in our electoral process.

Join us as we dive into insightful sessions, including:

  • Introduction & Background – Kate Sullivan (0:55)
  • Importance of Voter ID & Signature Verification – David Morsberger (7:58)
  • The Perils of Ranked Choice Voting – Steve Brown (19:44)
  • Keeping Elections Low-Tech & Local – Dale Livingston (24:35)
  • Why Only Citizens Can Vote – Jay Kaminsky (32:03)
  • Turning Information into Action – Kate Sullivan (39.19)

Listen in to stay informed and take action to secure all future elections!
